name: BetterThaana - Mihaaru.com
description:
I made it for my personal use. Maybe someone may find it useful.

Get MV A Waheed from here:

http://www.hassanhameed.com/?page_id=152
css:
@-moz-document domain("mihaaru.com") {
@font-face {
  font-family: Tharujamaanu;
  src: url(https://rawgit.com/maaldheefee/thaana-fonts/master/Tharujamaanu-Bold.eot);
  src: url(https://rawgit.com/maaldheefee/thaana-fonts/master/Tharujamaanu-Bold.eot?#iefix) format('embedded-opentype'),url(https://rawgit.com/maaldheefee/thaana-fonts/master/Tharujamaanu-Bold.woff2) format('woff2'),url(https://rawgit.com/maaldheefee/thaana-fonts/master/Tharujamaanu-Bold.woff) format('woff'),url(https://rawgit.com/maaldheefee/thaana-fonts/master/Tharujamaanu-Bold.ttf) format('truetype');
  font-weight: 700;
  font-style: normal
}

@font-face {
  font-family: Tharujamaanu;
  src: url(https://rawgit.com/maaldheefee/thaana-fonts/master/Tharujamaanu-Light.eot);
  src: url(https://rawgit.com/maaldheefee/thaana-fonts/master/Tharujamaanu-Light.eot?#iefix) format('embedded-opentype'),url(https://rawgit.com/maaldheefee/thaana-fonts/master/Tharujamaanu-Light.woff2) format('woff2'),url(https://rawgit.com/maaldheefee/thaana-fonts/master/Tharujamaanu-Light.woff) format('woff'),url(https://rawgit.com/maaldheefee/thaana-fonts/master/Tharujamaanu-Light.ttf) format('truetype');
  font-weight: 400;
  font-style: normal
}

.alert-stripe .alerts .alert-row .breaking-notice,
.article-details .comment-form .send-opts button[type=submit],
.article-details .comment-form label,
.article-details .comments-holder .comment-header .tabbed-list li a,
.article-details .comments-holder .comment-header .title,
.article-details .comments-holder .comment-row .user .commenter-details span.commenter,
.article-details .feelings-container .feeling .option span.title,
.article-details .login-options .cmmnt-btn,
.article-details .related-articles ul.article-list li .title,
.article-details .suggested-article .title,
.article-details a.article-tags,
.article-details article .live-posts .live-post .post .post-author-location,
.article-details article .live-posts .live-post .post-meta span.post-date,
.article-details article figure.gallery .gallery-embed-header .count,
.article-details article figure.gallery .gallery-embed-header .title,
.article-details article figure.question div,
.article-details article figure.quote,
.article-details article p.article-summary,
.article-details h1,
.awareness h1,
.breaking-block .coverage-label,
.breaking-block .row.additional ul.related-articles li a,
.breaking-block a.title,
.cat_news_holder .cat_latest_news_holder a.title,
.cat_news_holder .cat_main_news_holder .image a.title,
.cat_news_holder .section-nav .title,
.cat_news_holder .section-nav ul.sub-sections li a,
.featured-tag,
.fourZeroFour,
.gallery-container .gallery-summary h1,
.grid-view-listing .title a,
.guideline h1,
.home-main-news a.title,
.load-more,
.main_news_enhanced_size_8 .image a.title,
.main_news_enhanced_size_8 a.title,
.main_news_enhanced_size_8 ul.related-articles li a,
.main_news_size_2 a.title,
.main_news_size_4 .coverage-label.advertorial,
.main_news_size_4 a.title,
.main_news_size_8 .image a.title,
.main_news_size_8 a.title,
.main_news_size_8 ul.related-articles li a,
.main_news_size_school_guide .title,
.main_school_guide_size_4 .title,
.multimedia-block .home-page-gallery .title,
.multimedia-block .multimedia-thumb .meta-details span.title,
.navbar-inverse .nav li a,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-header .navbar-brand,
.navbar-inverse ul.nav.navbar-left ul.dropdown-menu li,
.navbar-inverse.secondary ul.navbar-nav.nav li.section-title a,
.profile-island .additional-info .key,
.profile-island .additional-info h1,
.profile-island .galleries .multimedia-thumb .title,
.profile-island .galleries h1,
.roadha .section-title ul li.text,
.roadha .slots-slick .slick-item .overlay span,
.roadha-menu ul li,
.section-enhanced-header,
.tiled-small a.title,
.video-item a.title,
.yr-section #comments .comment .member,
.yr-section #comments .comment .title,
.yr-section .article-feelings .feeling p,
.yr-section .tags a.article-tags,
h2,
h3,
ul.nav-tabs.tabbed-articles li a,
ul.nav-tabs.tabbed-articles li.active a {
  font-family: 'MV A Waheed'
}
.alert-stripe .alerts .alert-row .yellow-stripe,
.article-details #commentHolder .alert,
.article-details .by-line .date-time,
.article-details .by-line address,
.article-details .by-line address a.author,
.article-details .comment-form .alert ul li,
.article-details .comment-form .loadmore,
.article-details .comment-form .send-opts a,
.article-details .comment-form textarea,
.article-details .comments-holder .comment-row .alert,
.article-details .comments-holder .comment-row .user .commenter-details span.time,
.article-details .comments-holder .comment-row p,
.article-details .login-options .or-seperator,
.article-details .multimedia-caption-slider li,
.article-details .multimedia-holder .multimedia-slider .slide .video p,
.article-details .multimedia-holder .multimedia-slider .slide a .grad p,
.article-details article figure figcaption,
.awareness h3,
.awareness p,
.breaking-block p,
.cat_news_holder .cat_latest_news_holder p.summary,
.cat_news_holder .cat_main_news_holder p.summary,
.fullscreen-overlay .fullscreen-image-slider .fullscreen-image-row .image .caption,
.gallery-container .gallery-photo-row .photo-caption,
.gallery-container .gallery-summary .publish-time,
.gallery-container .gallery-summary p,
.guideline p,
.home-main-news .summary,
.main_news_enhanced_size_8 p.summary,
.main_news_size_8 p.summary,
.multimedia-block .home-page-gallery .hm-g-slider .slick-slide .caption,
.multimedia-block .home-page-gallery p,
.navbar-inverse .nav li.search-mobile div.search-form-holder form input,
.navbar-inverse ul.nav.navbar-left li.search .search-form-holder form input[type=text],
.roadha-menu .sky-container p,
.special-author-row .author-name,
.special-author-row p,
.yr-section #comments .comment .datetime,
.yr-section #comments .comment .text,
ul.tabbed-article-listing li a,
.article-details article p {
  font-family: Tharujamaanu,sans-serif
}
}
